statements: SELECT * FROM user_content;
SELECT content_id, content_type, author_id, content_title FROM user_content;
SELECT content_id, content_title, content_body FROM user_content WHERE author_id = 'fdbe4b61-9b86-4b3d-9c7e-4f325f2174cf';
SELECT * FROM user_content WHERE content_type = 'article' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT author_id, COUNT(*) AS total_content FROM user_content GROUP BY author_id HAVING total_content > 1;
SELECT * FROM user_content WHERE author_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT content_title, content_body FROM user_content WHERE content_type = 'article' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT content_id, content_type, author_id FROM user_content WHERE last_modified_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT author_id, COUNT(*) AS total_content FROM user_content GROUP BY author_id HAVING total_content > 5 ORDER BY total_content DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT content_type FROM user_content WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM articles
SELECT title, content, author_id FROM articles WHERE category = 'Technology'
SELECT article_id, title, author_id FROM articles WHERE author_id = 1
SELECT * FROM articles ORDER BY title DESC
SELECT * FROM images WHERE uploader_id = 3 ORDER BY uploaded_date
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE category = 'Technology'
SELECT title, author_id FROM articles WHERE article_id = 5
SELECT title, content, category FROM articles ORDER BY category ASC
SELECT * FROM images WHERE uploader_id = 10 ORDER BY uploaded_date DESC
SELECT image_url, caption FROM images WHERE image_id < 100
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT title, content FROM articles ORDER BY article_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE author_id = 3;
SELECT description, image_url FROM images WHERE uploader_id = 2;
SELECT title, video_url FROM videos ORDER BY video_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT title, content FROM articles WHERE article_id = 5;
SELECT image_url, description FROM images WHERE uploader_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE author_id = 2 ORDER BY video_id DESC;
SELECT title, video_url FROM videos WHERE author_id = 3 AND title LIKE '%tutorial%';
SELECT * FROM articles LIMIT 5;
SELECT article_id, title, content FROM articles WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT article_id, title FROM articles WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM images WHERE uploader_id = 3 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT title, content FROM articles WHERE author_id = 1
SELECT * FROM images ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT video_title, video_url FROM videos WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01'
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT article_id, title, author_id FROM articles JOIN users ON articles.author_id = users.user_id
SELECT * FROM Articles;
SELECT title, content FROM Articles WHERE published_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT title, url FROM Videos WHERE duration > 10;
SELECT comment_id, content FROM Comments WHERE article_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM Articles WHERE published_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT article_id, title, author_id FROM Articles WHERE author_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM Images ORDER BY created_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT c.content, a.title, u.username FROM Comments c JOIN Articles a ON c.article_id = a.article_id JOIN Users u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE c.created_date > '2022-06-01';
SELECT v.title, u.username FROM Videos v JOIN Users u ON v.uploader_id = u.user_id ORDER BY v.duration DESC;
